name: Avoid hard-coded network resource names (Javascript)
description:
This quality rule reports all artifacts that contain hard-coded 
- IP addresses (IPv4 and IPv6)
output:
Associated to each violation, the following information is provided:
- The number of violation occurrences
- Bookmarks for violation occurrences found in the source code
rationale: Built-in remote addresses cause problems when the target is moved. Avoid hard-coded network resources (e.g., IP addresses, URLs, etc.)
reference: ASCRM 1.0, Automated Source Code Reliability Measure, Object Management Group.
alternativeName: Ensure not having hard-coded network resources names in the source files (Javascript)
